text: When PostgreSQL and MediationZone are not installed on the same machine (the database may be installed on any machine within the network), the database definition files need to be transferred to the PostgreSQL machine before the database can be created. The database definition files are created in the ./database/postgresql subdirectory and archived in the database-setup.tar file. On the PostgreSQL machine (as a postgres UNIX user): transfer the database-setup.tar file from the MediationZone machine and extract the files: tar -xvf ./database-setup.tar Enter the database directory : cd database/postgresql
title: Extract Database Definition Files for PostgreSQL - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
